name: The Battle Of Mahjong
description: You can only find out the fun of playing “Mahjong” by yourself, I'm sure you'll addicted to it. Don’t hesitate, come and join “ THE BATTLE OF MAHJONG”!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 800 MB available space
